DOC.brief_title: The Effect Various Types Renin-angiotensin-aldosterone System Blockade Proteinuria
DOC.detailed_description: Pharmacological blockade renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system ( RAAS ) main target therapy reduce proteinuria rate decline glomerular filtration rate non-diabetic chronic renal disease . Despite recent progress , however , still optimal therapy stop progression nephropathy . Therefore , necessary optimize treatment improve renal outcome . The aim present study compare effect three different type RAAS blockade : ( 1 ) mineralocorticoid receptor blocker ( MRB ) + angiotensin receptor antagonist ( ARA ) ; ( 2 ) direct renin inhibitor ( DRI ) + ARA ( 3 ) double maximal dose ARA 24 hour proteinuria patient non-diabetic chronic kidney disease
